document_data.name: Lleu mac Gwydython
document_data.mainbody: '''Lleu mac Gwydython''' was a [[shield dwarf]] man of the dwarven city of [[Earthfast]] in the [[Earthroot]] region of the [[Underdark]] He was the son of [[Gwydython]]. He was a quiet, grim and moody miner like many dwarves of Earthfast.
